summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2001 KIA OPTIMA.  WHILE ATTEMPTING TO MAKE A TURN AROUND A BEND AT 45 MPH, THE CONTACT OVERCORRECTED THE TURN.  SHE TURNED THE VEHICLE BACK IN THE OTHER DIRECTION AND OVERCORRECTED AGAIN.  SHE WAS TWO FEET FROM DRIVING OFF THE ROAD.  THE VEHICLE WAS DRIVEN TO A MECHANIC AND IT WAS DISCOVERED THAT THE ENGINE CRADLE WAS CORRODED AND ROTTEN IN HALF.  THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGES WERE 90,000.
